switchpromotionconte.description: To take advantage of one of these great offers, select your utility.
switchpromotionconte.fineprinttext: * Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers who use 150 Mcf per year or less, enrolling with Ohio Natural Gas between {{currentmonthfirstday}} and {{currentmonthlastday}} using applicable promotion code; Visa Reward Card offer available only for such customers enrolling online at www.onlyong.com/WIN25. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Ohio choice program through Dominion East Ohio, Columbia Gas of Ohio, Duke Energy of Ohio and Vectren Energy Delivery of Ohio. ONG prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.654.2579, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit www.onlyong.com. Early termination charges apply for residential fixed price plans (12-Month plan: $150/$75, 6-Month plan: $75). Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the reward card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Cannot be combined with any other offer.
switchpromotionconte.heading: Choose from two great offers- our 12-month or 6-month fixed price plan!
switchpromotionconte.text:
We know you have a choice when it comes to your natural gas supplier, but when was the last time you shopped around for a better rate? Now is a great time to see what Ohio Natural Gas® has to offer. We’d love to have you back as a customer. To prove it, we’ve got two great offers!

SPECIAL BONUS: Enroll online and receive a $25 Visa® Reward Card!*  

Switching back is easy. Here's how it works.

- Locate your gas utility account number- it's on your bill.

- Select one of the plan offers and enroll. 

- Our natural gas experts will handle the details of your switch. You won't experience a service interruption. 

Hurry! Offer ends {{currentmonthlastday}}.
